#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType Round.

== Name ==

Round (complexType)

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--Round (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			Details about a round of golf: Location of the flags on greens (usually called pin sheet),
			weather conditions, date of the round, opponenents and partners, and the scorecard.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===
{{{
          <...>  (hole-placement?, weather?, foursome?, game?, wager?, date, scorecard  )</...>
}}}
----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| xs:dateTime || date ||  					Date and time of the round.				 ||
|| [CFourSome.html golfml:FourSome] || [CFourSome.html foursome] ||  					Player information for the round of golf.				 ||
|| [CGolfGame.html golfml:GolfGame] || [CGolfGame.html game] ||  					Information about the game(s) played during the round of golf.				 ||
|| [CHolePlacements.html golfml:HolePlacements] || [CHolePlacements.html hole-placement] ||  					Placement of holes for the round of golf.				 ||
|| [CScorecard.html golfml:Scorecard] || [CScorecard.html scorecard] ||  					Scorecard of the round for the player.				 ||
|| [CRoomForExtension.html golfml:RoomForExtension] || [CRoomForExtension.html wager] ||  					Information about the wagers during the round of golf.				 ||
|| [CWeather.html golfml:Weather] || [CWeather.html weather] ||  					Weather information for the round of golf.				 ||

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CPlayer.html Player]
